headline: 'You can almost hear the uncontrollable weeping': Josh Mandel roasted after Trump humiliatingly endorses JD Vance
author: Brad Reed

The important part is that you were the biggest shitbird you could be.https://twitter.com/joshmandelohio/status/1515077412081614855\u00a0\u2026

Mandel, who had worked incredibly hard to butter up Trump for an endorsement, posted a tweet that continued heaping praise on the twice-impeached former president even though he just dealt a significant hit to his hopes of winning the upcoming primary.
Ohio Republican Senate hopeful Josh Mandel suffered a humiliating blow on Friday when former President Donald Trump officially endorsed rival J.D.
"I look forward to earning his endorsement in the general election and working with him to defeat Tim Ryan in November."
"I continue to be a proud supporter of President Trump and the America First agenda," Mandel wrote.
Many of Mandel's followers gleefully piled on to rub salt in the wounds, however.
The important part isn\u2019t that you weren\u2019t enough of a shitbird.
Grawlix\u2122 (@The Very Vaccinated and Very Masked &%#@!
